body_html:
when idx = 0, according to idx_tree0, idx_idy0, y0 = obtain_idx_of_tree(tree0), we will obtain idx_tree = [0, 1, 2].
When idx = 1, if we jump into obtain_idx_of_tree(tree0), idx_tree should be [], however we find idx_tree = [0, 1, 2]!!!
So, now you undersatnd what I mean
